amendment.description: To require a study of the military death gratuity and other death benefits provided for survivors of deceased members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 820 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 820 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S6900; text: CR S6900) To require a study of the military death gratuity and other death benefits provided for survivors of deceased members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 820 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 820 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
